definitions.definition: (especially in the past) a person who fights in a battle or war

examples.text: a warrior nation *(= whose people are skilled in fighting)*
He views himself as a holy warrior.
the armchair warriors at the Department of Defense
the graves of the fallen warriors
the last of the ancient warriors
A Viking warrior would be buried with his weapons: usually his sword, spear, shield and battleaxe.

definitions.definition: a person who leads or takes part in a campaign for a political or social cause, especially in an aggressive way that other people think is bad

examples.text: These **social justice warriors** want to apply their politically correct standards and rules to others' speech.

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old Northern French werreior, variant of Old French guerreior, from guerreier ‘make war’, from guerre ‘war’.
